DOC.brief_summary: The aim registry collect clinical data nitinol self-expanding STENTYS Xposition S™ order evaluate efficacy safety patient present ST segment elevation myocardial infarction
DOC.brief_title: Italian Multi-center Registry Self-apposing Coronary Stent Patients With STEMI
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year age old presenting symptom consistent STElevation Myocardial Infarction ( STEMI ) last ≤12 hr duration , ≥2 mm STsegment elevation ≥2 contiguous lead , treat primary stent implantation ( Xposition S plan per operator 's assessment ) . Cardiogenic shock Multiple lesion require stenting target vessel . Highly calcify lesion excessive tortuosity target lesion site . Intrastent pathology . Subject unable take comply dual antiplatelet therapy recommend per guideline . Female subject childbearing potential know pregnant . Comorbidities life expectancy le 1 year Patient unable provide write informed consent . Known allergy stent component .
